ctx: intros l1 l2 l3 a H1 H2 H3 H4.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) l1, l2, l3 : list (Term A n) a : Term A n H1 : plusP l1 l2 l3 H2 : olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l1) H3 : olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l2) H4 : olist (A:=A) ltM l3 Unable to unify "plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M1719 ?M1721) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M1720 ?M1722) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M1719 ?M1723)" with "olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l3) /\\ nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l3)".

ctx: intros l1 l2 l3 a H1 H2 H3 H4.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) l1, l2, l3 : list (Term A n) a : Term A n H1 : plusP l1 l2 l3 H2 : olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l1) H3 : olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l2) H4 : olist (A:=A) ltM l3 Unable to unify "plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M1719 ?M1721) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M1720 ?M1722) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M1719 ?M1723)" with "olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l3) /\\ nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l3)".

original: intros l1 l2 l3 a H1 H2 H3 H4. apply canonical_imp_olist in H2. apply canonical_imp_olist in H3. apply canonical_imp_olist in H4. apply mainu1. - auto. - auto. - apply mainu1. + auto. + auto.
